Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Camu quickly opens the box you handed him. Inside is a necklace with an abstract, metallic bird-shaped pendant.'}
{3: "While you explain what the pendant represents, you also tell Camu the stories of the Valentine's Day."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Do you enjoy this kind of convoluted plot?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I wouldn't be able to wait a whole year if I wanted to see someone. That person better show up before me immediately.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I just suddenly realized that we haven't seen each other for a while.", 3: '10'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I came to see you twice, but you were busy, so I left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Huh? Coughâ€”don't misinterpret my words! We can see each other whenever we want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Now that you're free, I'll bring you to the restaurant I wanted to take you last time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I believe the place is in... that direction. Stop daydreaming! Let's go!", 4: '1'}
